soulessences:GremlinNobSoul.NAME: Gremlin Nob Soul
soulessences:GremlinNobSoul.FLAVOR: You feel rage building up inside you.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #ysoulessences:Enraged.

soulessences:SentrySoul.NAME: Sentry Soul
soulessences:SentrySoul.FLAVOR: You feel quite confused with how these automatons have a soul...

soulessences:LagavulinSoul.NAME: Lagavulin Soul
soulessences:LagavulinSoul.FLAVOR: You feel power growing and your body hardening. In return, you feel your movements are limited.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b3 #ysoulessences:Exhausted. Afterwards, gain #b8 #yMetallicize and #b3 #yStrength & #yDexterity.

soulessences:BookOfStabbingSoul.NAME: Book of Stabbing Soul
soulessences:BookOfStabbingSoul.FLAVOR: You feel a bit more obsessed with stabbing.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, have an #y85% chance for the first Attack to be played thrice.

soulessences:GremlinLeaderSoul.NAME: Gremlin Leader Soul
soulessences:GremlinLeaderSoul.FLAVOR: The remaining gremlins start to follows you.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b2 turns, receive #b2 random effects from Gremlins.

soulessences:TaskMasterSoul.NAME: Taskmaster Soul
soulessences:TaskMasterSoul.FLAVOR: You feel a bit [REDACTED] towards certain enemies.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, apply #b2 #yWeak and #yVulnerable to ALL enemies.

soulessences:GiantHeadSoul.NAME: Giant Head Soul
soulessences:GiantHeadSoul.FLAVOR: Your head feels a bit heavier.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #ySlow to ALL enemies.

soulessences:NemesisSoul.NAME: Nemesis Soul
soulessences:NemesisSoul.FLAVOR: You feel death lurking but you aren't afraid to face it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 #yIntangible every #b2 turns. Can only gain up to #b3.

soulessences:ReptomancerSoul.NAME: Reptomancer Soul
soulessences:ReptomancerSoul.FLAVOR: You gained the ability to summon poison daggers.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yShuffle #b6 Poisoned Stab with #b0 cost to the top of your deck.

DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #ysoulessences:Enraged.
